## **转自**

[ [不止于python](https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/D6Nz-WDtgbDERN8G4ztITA "不止于python") ]

## 目标网站

> https://match.yuanrenxue.com/match/1

## 目标要求

> 抓取所有（5页）机票的价格，并计算所有机票价格的平均值，填入答案。

![](/images/6f170640/1.png)

## 网站分析

这种js逆向的问题, 首先要打开开发者工具(控制台), 刷新网页, 很明显这个地址, 就是我们要破解的url

> https://match.yuanrenxue.com/api/match/1?m=376ce684e9277c7203c34508d4f1c705%E4%B8%A81636883345

![](/images/6f170640/2.png)

点击下一页, 看看有没有什么规律, 看起来页数和m的值是变化的, 页数暂时不用管, 那m的值就是我们需要破解的参数

![](/images/6f170640/3.png)

找到目标后, 接下来就是找加密的js代码, 首先就是搜索关键字, 我们先来搜索**m=**, 看搜索结果第一个比较像, 点进去后发现并不是想要的

 

![](/images/6f170640/4.png)

 

 

再来看看m参数, 长这个样子

> c9d12a0dbcdd7c26a7abb5913dae7745丨1636883488

搜一下关键字**丨**, 注意是中文字符的**丨**, 结果显示也没有

 

![](/images/6f170640/5.png)

接下来换个思路找, 查看这个url的请求堆栈

![](/images/6f170640/6.png)

看到前两个请求调用的jquery的两个函数, 直接点第三个, 可以看到是一行无法自动格式化的js代码

![](/images/6f170640/7.png)

 

 

把它复制出来找个第三方工具, 格式化一下, 我用的Chrome插件(FeHelper), 格式化后, 会看到一行混淆后的js

![](/images/6f170640/8.png)

再把它复制出来, 用猿人学的工具(http://tool.yuanrenxue.com/deobfuscator)来解一下混淆js代码

![](/images/6f170640/9.png)

 

> 这下就明白为什么搜 丨, 搜不来了, 是给混淆了, 可以清楚的看到这个m是由oo0O0函数 + window.f + '丨' + \_0x2268f9(Date.parse(new Date()) + 100000000) / 1000组成的

接下来就是, 破解这段代码的各个参数, 哪里不明白的直接在控制台测试一下,

但是这个网站的一打开控制台就是无限的debugger, 先把这个烦人的无限的debugger关掉, 点击输出这行内容的js代码

![](/images/6f170640/10.png)

然后右击选中行, 选择 一律不在此处暂停(Never pause here)选项

![](/images/6f170640/11.png)

然后看代码, 一个个解密参数

**\_0x2268f9**: 是一个时间戳

![](/images/6f170640/12.png)

oo0O0 函数: 在页面中一下就能看到

```

function oo0O0(mw) {
    window.b = '';
    for (var i = 0, len = window.a.length; i < len; i++) {
        console.log(window.a[i]);
        window.b += String[document.e + document.g](window.a[i][document.f + document.h]() - i - window.c)
    }
    var U = ['W5r5W6VdIHZcT8kU', 'WQ8CWRaxWQirAW=='];
    var J = function (o, E) {
        o = o - 0x0;
        var N = U[o];
        if (J['bSSGte'] === undefined) {
            var Y = function (w) {
                var m = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789+/=',
                    T = String(w)['replace'](/=+$/, '');
                var A = '';
                for (var C = 0x0, b, W, l = 0x0; W = T['charAt'](l++); ~W && (b = C % 0x4 ? b * 0x40 + W : W, C++
                        % 0x4) ? A += String['fromCharCode'](0xff & b >> (-0x2 * C & 0x6)) : 0x0) {
                    W = m['indexOf'](W)
                }
                return A
            };
            var t = function (w, m) {
                var T = [],
                    A = 0x0,
                    C, b = '',
                    W = '';
                w = Y(w);
                for (var R = 0x0, v = w['length']; R < v; R++) {
                    W += '%' + ('00' + w['charCodeAt'](R)['toString'](0x10))['slice'](-0x2)
                }
                w = decodeURIComponent(W);
                var l;
                for (l = 0x0; l < 0x100; l++) {
                    T[l] = l
                }
                for (l = 0x0; l < 0x100; l++) {
                    A = (A + T[l] + m['charCodeAt'](l % m['length'])) % 0x100, C = T[l], T[l] = T[A], T[A] = C
                }
                l = 0x0, A = 0x0;
                for (var L = 0x0; L < w['length']; L++) {
                    l = (l + 0x1) % 0x100, A = (A + T[l]) % 0x100, C = T[l], T[l] = T[A], T[A] = C, b += String[
                        'fromCharCode'](w['charCodeAt'](L) ^ T[(T[l] + T[A]) % 0x100])
                }
                return b
            };
            J['luAabU'] = t, J['qlVPZg'] = {}, J['bSSGte'] = !![]
        }
        var H = J['qlVPZg'][o];
        return H === undefined ? (J['TUDBIJ'] === undefined && (J['TUDBIJ'] = !![]), N = J['luAabU'](N, E), J[
            'qlVPZg'][o] = N) : N = H, N
    };
    eval(atob(window['b'])[J('0x0', ']dQW')](J('0x1', 'GTu!'), '\x27' + mw + '\x27'));
    return ''
}


```

现在可以确定**mw**是一个字符串时间戳, 把js代码放在本地跑一下, 看一下相关的参数

> 这里我用的是js2py, 完全不依赖js环境, 直接将js代码转为python代码执行, 但是缺点也很明显, 没有那么完整的js环境, 缺少的需要自己补齐

```

import js2py
import time

js = js2py.EvalJs()
js.execute(open("oo0O0.js", encoding="utf-8").read())
js.oo0O0(str(int(time.time()) * 1000 + 100000000))


```

一运行就会报错

```
js2py.internals.simplex.JsException: TypeError: Undefined and null dont have properties (tried getting property 'length')
```

看一下js, 是window.a那里报的错, 是因为没有定义window.a这个变量, 从控制台找出来补上, 顺便把其它的几个也补上

![](/images/6f170640/13.png)

 

因为**js2py**运行有document依赖的代码会报错, 所以在代码里面将document的属性, 写到windows里面(或者直接定义为变量), 代码也要改一下

![](/images/6f170640/14.png)

这时候在此运行会发现, 到最后一行报错了, 这是因为**js2py**没有atob函数

```
js2py.internals.simplex.JsException: ReferenceError: atob is not defined
```

先来看一下, eval最后一行的各个组成打印一下

```

"window['b']"
''
"J('0x0', ']dQW')"
'replace'
"J('0x1', 'GTu!')"
'mwqqppz'
"''' + mw + '''"
"'1636895868000'"


```

明白了各个部分, 可以把这行js变一下

```
eval(atob(window['b'])[J('0x0', ']dQW')](J('0x1', 'GTu!'), 'x27' + mw + 'x27'));
```

 

改成这样

```
eval(atob(window['b'])['replace']('mwqqppz', mw));
```

再来看一下atob(window['b']) 是个啥结果

既然**atob**本地会报错, 那就放到控制台执行一下

![](/images/6f170640/15.png)

格式化一下, 可以看到是一个md5加密, 最后赋值给了window.f

![](/images/6f170640/16.png)

> 到这里基本就明白了, 其实就是把  md5字符串js  的  mwqqppz  替换成了 mw, 然后eval执行了 hex\_md5(mw), 最后赋值给了 window.f

简化一下m参数的加密代码

```
m = window.f + '丨' + _0x2268f9 / 1000;
```

也就是

```
m = hex_md5(_0x2268f9) + '丨' + _0x2268f9 / 1000;
```

接下来只需要用python实现, 然后测试就行了✌️

## 源码

```

# test.py
import js2py
from js2py import require
import time
import requests

def load_js():
    js = js2py.EvalJs()
    with open('md5.js', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as r:
        js.execute(r.read())
    return js

js = load_js()

total = 0
times = 0
for i in range(1, 6):
    t = int(time.time()) * 1000 + 100000000
    mm = js.m(str(t))
    params = (
        ("page", i),
        ('m', "\u4E28".join([mm,str(int(t/1000))])),
    )
    headers = {'User-Agent':'yuanrenxue.project'}
    response = requests.get('https://match.yuanrenxue.com/api/match/1', headers=headers, params=params)
    data = response.json()["data"]
    times += len(data)
    for d in data:
        total += d["value"]

print(total / times)


```

```

# md5.js
var hexcase = 0;
var b64pad = "";
var chrsz = 16;

function hex_md5(a) {
    return binl2hex(core_md5(str2binl(a), a.length * chrsz))
}

function b64_md5(a) {
    return binl2b64(core_md5(str2binl(a), a.length * chrsz))
}

function str_md5(a) {
    return binl2str(core_md5(str2binl(a), a.length * chrsz))
}

function hex_hmac_md5(a, b) {
    return binl2hex(core_hmac_md5(a, b))
}

function b64_hmac_md5(a, b) {
    return binl2b64(core_hmac_md5(a, b))
}

function str_hmac_md5(a, b) {
    return binl2str(core_hmac_md5(a, b))
}

function md5_vm_test() {
    return hex_md5("abc") == "900150983cd24fb0d6963f7d28e17f72"
}

function core_md5(p, k) {
    p[k >> 5] |= 128 << ((k) % 32);
    p[(((k + 64) >>> 9) << 4) + 14] = k;
    var o = 1732584193;
    var n = -271733879;
    var m = -1732584194;
    var l = 271733878;
    for (var g = 0; g < p.length; g += 16) {
        var j = o;
        var h = n;
        var f = m;
        var e = l;
        o = md5_ff(o, n, m, l, p[g + 0], 7, -680976936);
        l = md5_ff(l, o, n, m, p[g + 1], 12, -389564586);
        m = md5_ff(m, l, o, n, p[g + 2], 17, 606105819);
        n = md5_ff(n, m, l, o, p[g + 3], 22, -1044525330);
        o = md5_ff(o, n, m, l, p[g + 4], 7, -176418897);
        l = md5_ff(l, o, n, m, p[g + 5], 12, 1200080426);
        m = md5_ff(m, l, o, n, p[g + 6], 17, -1473231341);
        n = md5_ff(n, m, l, o, p[g + 7], 22, -45705983);
        o = md5_ff(o, n, m, l, p[g + 8], 7, 1770035416);
        l = md5_ff(l, o, n, m, p[g + 9], 12, -1958414417);
        m = md5_ff(m, l, o, n, p[g + 10], 17, -42063);
        n = md5_ff(n, m, l, o, p[g + 11], 22, -1990404162);
        o = md5_ff(o, n, m, l, p[g + 12], 7, 1804660682);
        l = md5_ff(l, o, n, m, p[g + 13], 12, -40341101);
        m = md5_ff(m, l, o, n, p[g + 14], 17, -1502002290);
        n = md5_ff(n, m, l, o, p[g + 15], 22, 1236535329);
        o = md5_gg(o, n, m, l, p[g + 1], 5, -165796510);
        l = md5_gg(l, o, n, m, p[g + 6], 9, -1069501632);
        m = md5_gg(m, l, o, n, p[g + 11], 14, 643717713);
        n = md5_gg(n, m, l, o, p[g + 0], 20, -373897302);
        o = md5_gg(o, n, m, l, p[g + 5], 5, -701558691);
        l = md5_gg(l, o, n, m, p[g + 10], 9, 38016083);
        m = md5_gg(m, l, o, n, p[g + 15], 14, -660478335);
        n = md5_gg(n, m, l, o, p[g + 4], 20, -405537848);
        o = md5_gg(o, n, m, l, p[g + 9], 5, 568446438);
        l = md5_gg(l, o, n, m, p[g + 14], 9, -1019803690);
        m = md5_gg(m, l, o, n, p[g + 3], 14, -187363961);
        n = md5_gg(n, m, l, o, p[g + 8], 20, 1163531501);
        o = md5_gg(o, n, m, l, p[g + 13], 5, -1444681467);
        l = md5_gg(l, o, n, m, p[g + 2], 9, -51403784);
        m = md5_gg(m, l, o, n, p[g + 7], 14, 1735328473);
        n = md5_gg(n, m, l, o, p[g + 12], 20, -1921207734);
        o = md5_hh(o, n, m, l, p[g + 5], 4, -378558);
        l = md5_hh(l, o, n, m, p[g + 8], 11, -2022574463);
        m = md5_hh(m, l, o, n, p[g + 11], 16, 1839030562);
        n = md5_hh(n, m, l, o, p[g + 14], 23, -35309556);
        o = md5_hh(o, n, m, l, p[g + 1], 4, -1530992060);
        l = md5_hh(l, o, n, m, p[g + 4], 11, 1272893353);
        m = md5_hh(m, l, o, n, p[g + 7], 16, -155497632);
        n = md5_hh(n, m, l, o, p[g + 10], 23, -1094730640);
        o = md5_hh(o, n, m, l, p[g + 13], 4, 681279174);
        l = md5_hh(l, o, n, m, p[g + 0], 11, -358537222);
        m = md5_hh(m, l, o, n, p[g + 3], 16, -722881979);
        n = md5_hh(n, m, l, o, p[g + 6], 23, 76029189);
        o = md5_hh(o, n, m, l, p[g + 9], 4, -640364487);
        l = md5_hh(l, o, n, m, p[g + 12], 11, -421815835);
        m = md5_hh(m, l, o, n, p[g + 15], 16, 530742520);
        n = md5_hh(n, m, l, o, p[g + 2], 23, -995338651);
        o = md5_ii(o, n, m, l, p[g + 0], 6, -198630844);
        l = md5_ii(l, o, n, m, p[g + 7], 10, 11261161415);
        m = md5_ii(m, l, o, n, p[g + 14], 15, -1416354905);
        n = md5_ii(n, m, l, o, p[g + 5], 21, -57434055);
        o = md5_ii(o, n, m, l, p[g + 12], 6, 1700485571);
        l = md5_ii(l, o, n, m, p[g + 3], 10, -1894446606);
        m = md5_ii(m, l, o, n, p[g + 10], 15, -1051523);
        n = md5_ii(n, m, l, o, p[g + 1], 21, -2054922799);
        o = md5_ii(o, n, m, l, p[g + 8], 6, 1873313359);
        l = md5_ii(l, o, n, m, p[g + 15], 10, -30611744);
        m = md5_ii(m, l, o, n, p[g + 6], 15, -1560198380);
        n = md5_ii(n, m, l, o, p[g + 13], 21, 1309151649);
        o = md5_ii(o, n, m, l, p[g + 4], 6, -145523070);
        l = md5_ii(l, o, n, m, p[g + 11], 10, -1120210379);
        m = md5_ii(m, l, o, n, p[g + 2], 15, 718787259);
        n = md5_ii(n, m, l, o, p[g + 9], 21, -343485551);
        o = safe_add(o, j);
        n = safe_add(n, h);
        m = safe_add(m, f);
        l = safe_add(l, e)
    }
    return Array(o, n, m, l)
}

function md5_cmn(h, e, d, c, g, f) {
    return safe_add(bit_rol(safe_add(safe_add(e, h), safe_add(c, f)), g), d)
}

function md5_ff(g, f, k, j, e, i, h) {
    return md5_cmn((f & k) | ((~f) & j), g, f, e, i, h)
}

function md5_gg(g, f, k, j, e, i, h) {
    return md5_cmn((f & j) | (k & (~j)), g, f, e, i, h)
}

function md5_hh(g, f, k, j, e, i, h) {
    return md5_cmn(f ^ k ^ j, g, f, e, i, h)
}

function md5_ii(g, f, k, j, e, i, h) {
    return md5_cmn(k ^ (f | (~j)), g, f, e, i, h)
}

function core_hmac_md5(c, f) {
    var e = str2binl(c);
    if (e.length > 16) {
        e = core_md5(e, c.length * chrsz)
    }
    var a = Array(16),
        d = Array(16);
    for (var b = 0; b < 16; b++) {
        a[b] = e[b] ^ 909522486;
        d[b] = e[b] ^ 1549556828
    }
    var g = core_md5(a.concat(str2binl(f)), 512 + f.length * chrsz);
    return core_md5(d.concat(g), 512 + 128)
}

function safe_add(a, d) {
    var c = (a & 65535) + (d & 65535);
    var b = (a >> 16) + (d >> 16) + (c >> 16);
    return (b << 16) | (c & 65535)
}

function bit_rol(a, b) {
    return (a << b) | (a >>> (32 - b))
}

function str2binl(d) {
    var c = Array();
    var a = (1 << chrsz) - 1;
    for (var b = 0; b < d.length * chrsz; b += chrsz) {
        c[b >> 5] |= (d.charCodeAt(b / chrsz) & a) << (b % 32)
    }
    return c
}

function binl2str(c) {
    var d = "";
    var a = (1 << chrsz) - 1;
    for (var b = 0; b < c.length * 32; b += chrsz) {
        d += String.fromCharCode((c[b >> 5] >>> (b % 32)) & a)
    }
    return d
}

function binl2hex(c) {
    var b = hexcase ? "0123456789ABCDEF" : "0123456789abcdef";
    var d = "";
    for (var a = 0; a < c.length * 4; a++) {
        d += b.charAt((c[a >> 2] >> ((a % 4) * 8 + 4)) & 15) + b.charAt((c[a >> 2] >> ((a % 4) * 8)) & 15)
    }
    return d
}

function binl2b64(d) {
    var c = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/";
    var f = "";
    for (var b = 0; b < d.length * 4; b += 3) {
        var e = (((d[b >> 2] >> 8 * (b % 4)) & 255) << 16) | (((d[b + 1 >> 2] >> 8 * ((b + 1) % 4)) & 255) << 8) | ((d[
            b + 2 >> 2] >> 8 * ((b + 2) % 4)) & 255);
        for (var a = 0; a < 4; a++) {
            if (b * 8 + a * 6 > d.length * 32) {
                f += b64pad
            } else {
                f += c.charAt((e >> 6 * (3 - a)) & 63)
            }
        }
    }
    return f
};

function m(t){
    return hex_md5(t)
}

```

相关推
